title: Murder In Scotland: A woman, a dream, and fate collide.
description: Secret tragedy, broken dreams, and murder. Rebecca must unravel the mystery of her dreams. Dreams that turn from love to murder. Can she figure out what they mean in time to have what she wants most? She travels to Scotland to collect an inheritance handed down to her. Intriguing and handsome men enter her life, but feelings of confusion and doubtfulness fill her mind. Confused and alone, she soon learns she cannot trust anyone. People are missing, questions are raised about her new friends, and it's up to Rebecca to unravel the mystery.
author: J.B. Darroch
